name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: represents an "Instant" as defined in the OWL Time Specification.CTS2 implementations must be able to support temporal units of second, minute, hour, day, month, and year, and be able to represent and compare instances represented in any of these units. DateAndTime can only provide a partial ordering and, as a consequence, is never used as an index, unique identifier or to sequence data or events.
